text: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مَّصْفُوفَةٍ ۖ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ

translation.en.sahih: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes.
translation.id.indonesian: mereka bertelekan di atas dipan-dipan berderetan dan Kami kawinkan mereka dengan bidadari-bidadari yang cantik bermata jeli.
